Functions

con_file_to_NumberOfConnectedCells_sheet(...)

con_file: path to .con file genereate by SingleCellInputMapper

read_hoc_file([fname])

read_scalar_field([fname])

write_anatomical_realization_map([fname, ...])

writes list of all functional connections coded by tuples (cell type, presynaptic cell index, synapse index).

write_cell_synapse_locations([fname, ...])

writes list of all synapses with the locations coded by section ID and section x of cell with ID 'cellID'

write_landmark_file([fname, landmarkList])

write Amira landmark file landmarkList has to be iterable of tuples, each of which holds 3 float coordinates

write_population_and_sample_connectivity_summary([...])

write_population_connectivity_summary([...])

Classes

CellParser([hocFilename])

class providing methods for setting up morphology in NEURON hoc object

Edge()

Edge object contains list of points, diameter at each point, label, string hocLabel, parentID Used during reading of hoc files

NetworkMapper(postCell, postCellType, ...)

Handles connectivity of presynaptic populations to multi-compartmental neuron model.

PointCell([column, cellType])

simple object for use as cell connecting to synapses

ScalarField([mesh, origin, extent, spacing, ...])

implements 3D scalar field based on numpy array used for e.g.

SynapseDensity(cell, postCellType, ...)

Synapse density computation for one postsynaptic neuron and arbitrary presynaptic bouton and other postsynaptic PST densities

SynapseMapper([cell, synDist, isDensity])

SynapseMapper assigns synapses to neuron morphology self.cell is neuron SpatialGraph self.synDist is average synapse distribution (3D scalar field) self.isDensity: True - synapse distribution interpreted as avg density; actual number of synapses assigned is drawn from a Poisson distribution False - synapse distribution interpreted as actual number of synapses per voxel and directly assigned self.voxelEdgeMap: dictionary mapping synapse distribution mesh coordinates on list with pairs of indices that correspond to the edge and edgePt ID of all morphology points inside that voxel

mdbopen(path[, mode])
